articles.author: Laurence Norman
articles.title: EU Set to Recommend Halting Nonessential Travel From the U.S. - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The European Union action is in response to the increase in U.S. coronavirus cases
articles.content:
The European Union is set to recommend halting nonessential travel from the U.S. because of the spread of Covid-19, diplomats said on Sunday.
